analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna duka
translated: The Dhamma Section in Pairs🔽The Dyad on Arisen through Contact with the Mind

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a state arisen through contact with the mind as condition, a state arisen through contact with the mind … (Abbreviated.)
With root-cause as condition, nine … With no condition as condition, nine.
